body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places         White Haven from 1875 Frank Leslie's Illustrated newspaper. Ulysses S. Grant NHS  In addition to the five historic structures on the Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site property, there are several other places associated with the historic White Haven estate.  Click on one of the links under Places to the left to learn more about them.
title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Places
